pipesrus

Class Pipe

  • java.lang.Object
    • pipesrus.Pipe
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Type1Pipe, Type2Pipe, Type3Pipe, Type4Pipe, Type5Pipe

    public abstract class Pipe
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract class for the pipes ordered by the system.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pipe

        public Pipe()
        Blank constructor.

      • Pipe

        public Pipe(double l,
            double d,
            int gO,
            int cO,
            boolean iI,
            boolean oR,
            boolean cR)
        Main constructor for a pipe. All of the requirements for it are specified in the parameters below.
        Parameters:
        l - The length of the pipe in metres.
        d - The diameter of the pipe in inches.
        gO - The plastic grade ordered (grade 1-5).
        cO - The number of colours ordered (0, 1, or 2).
        iI - Whether or not inner insulation has been ordered (boolean).
        oR - Whether or not outer reinforcement has been ordered (boolean).
        cR - Whether or not chemical resistance has been ordered (boolean).

    • Method Detail

      • setPlasticGrades

        public void setPlasticGrades(int[] pG)
        Sets the integer array of valid plastic grades for use in the valid() method.
        Parameters:
        pG - Array of valid plastic grades.

      • setLength

        public void setLength(double l)
        Sets the length of the pipe.
        Parameters:
        l - Length in metres.

      • setDiameter

        public void setDiameter(double d)
        Sets the diameter of the pipe.
        Parameters:
        d - Diameter in inches.

      • valid

        public boolean valid()
        Checks whether the current pipe is a valid order. Checks the credentials of the ordered pipe set in the parameters of the constructor, against the valid settings defined in each of the type classes.
        Returns:
        True/false as to whether the pipe is valid.

      • calcCost

        public double calcCost()
        Calculates the cost of the pipe.
        Returns:
        The cost of the pipe as a double.

      • returnDetails

        public java.lang.String returnDetails()
        Generates a string containing all of the details of the order. Used in the output text documents and in the order list in the GUI
        Returns:
        Pipe details in the form 'Length: | Diameter: | Plastic Grade: | Colours: | Any extra orders | Cost:
